subject: Cricket (Game)
Deaths (Obituaries)
Rugby (Game)
Umpires
lead_paragraph: So remarkable was the sporting life of Mr. Tindill that being the longest lived of all the 2,600 men who have played test cricket was far from his greatest achievement.
